ABOUT US

Mallet Maniacs

This is a new site set up for Mallet Maniacs Community Percussion Ensemble. Here you will find information and links including audio, video, and to exercises in pdf format for downloading.

Known regionally as The Mallet Maniacs, anyone living in Southeastern MA and RI, USA, is eligible to join from 5th grade through college. No prior experience necessary to join.

We play at various functions throughout the year including the annual PAS Festival at the University of Rhode Island each March.
